name: Straya Mate
description:
As Australia is getting more diverse, many of the slangs become less known to its people. This game is about removing the language barrier (interpret that how you like) by typing in the right words to remove the objects on screen and progress through the game.

This game was developed during Global Game Jam 2018 for the theme ’Transmission'.

Developers:
Celeste Chan - Twitter & Instagram
Arielle Lee - Twitter & Instagram
